youtube.title: How Monochorionic and Dichorionic Twins Form | 3D Embryology Guide
youtube.description: Discover the biological process behind twin formation. We explain the key differences between monochorionic and dichorionic twins, from fertilization to implantation in the endometrium. Learn about zygote division and how multiple pregnancies develop in the womb.
